## [Interdisciplinary Research Collaborations](research-interdisciplinary.qmd)
Cross-disciplinary partnerships bringing together pharmacy, statistics, computer science, and clinical medicine expertise.

## [Open Science and Reproducible Research](research-open-science.qmd)
Advancing transparent, accessible, and verifiable research practices in pharmaceutical sciences.
